law.catch_line: Statewide planning and mapping system for public buildings.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 15, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 223, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 193, sec. 14, instructs the Reviser of Statutes to correct statutory references to agencies and officers whose names have been changed in the Act, as it confirms reorganization within the executive branch and establishes the Kentucky Office of Homeland Security. Such a correction has been made in this section.
